p: Frater Michael Bureau sacre theologie doctor Abas monasterii
beati petri de cultura prope Cenomanensis ad augmentum domini
cultus suffragium et adiutorum fratrum deffunctorum de bonis baculi
pastoralis fundat duo anniversaria in vigiliis santorum Juliani ac
Bertranni singulis annis in perpetuum celebranda in predicto monasterio
